getLastInvoiceNumberQuery: SELECT id FROM Invoice ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1;
addNewInvoiceQuery: INSERT INTO Invoice ( reverseCharge,invioceDate, state, stateCode,transportationMode,vehicleNumber, dateOfSupply,placeOfSupply,customerName,customerAddress,consigneeName,consigneeAddress,hsnCode) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
